revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife}} '''A_WakeOracleSpectre'''
(''no parameter'')
Finds a single {{Class|AlienSpectre3}} actor in the map and transfers the target to the actor. The spectre is then set to its See state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Oracle}} and derived classes.
